description:
Welcome to our clean, well-furnished studio apt located in the heart of the East Village.  

Get access to the greatest variety of bars, restaurants, boutique stores, all within a few steps.

Large, south facing studio with loads of natural light. A block away from St. Marks Place, you can have access to all the fun with some space for peace and quiet.

Close to the 6, N and R trains, and a 5 minute walk to Union Square.

Amenities Include: 
* Full Size Bed
* 46" 3DTV with Internet Access (including Netflix)
*Playstation 4
* WiFi
*Full Kitchen with Microwave, Stove, and Oven
*Full bathroom with Shower and Bathtub
*Only one flight of stairs

The entire apartment is yours.  There's also a laundromat on the block. 

Feel free to use the TV, Wifi, Playstation; read the books and magazines; cook to your heart's desire (although the food in the East Village is rather spectacular and we're happy to provide recommendations)

Always reachable by text and phone. Around the neighborhood if there's an emergency.

We're also happy to offer recommendations for activities, dining, and transportation!

Taxis/Ubers/Lyfts are abundant in the East Village.

The 6 and N,R subway lines are a few blocks away.
name: Sunny Studio in the Heart of the East Village
review: Everything was as planned, the apt was really confortable, near the metro and near several bars, grocery stores, pharmacies and restaurants.
